author: Ted Greenwald
title: IBM Earnings: What to Watch
text:
International Business Machines Corp. is scheduled to announce first-quarter earnings after the market closes Tuesday. Hereâ€™s what to look for:
EARNINGS FORECAST: Analysts expect IBM to report earnings of $2.42 a share on an adjusted basis that typically omits acquisition- and retirement-related charges, according to a survey by Thomson Reuters. A year ago, IBM reported $2.38 a share in adjusted profit.
